synonyms: trayodaśe—in the Thirteenth Chapter; ratha-āge—in front of the Jagannātha Ratha; prabhura nartana—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu's dancing; caturdaśe—in the Fourteenth Chapter; herā-pañcamī—Herā-pañcamī, which takes place on the fifth day of Ratha-yātrā; yātrā—festival; daraśana—visiting.
translation: In the Thirteenth Chapter I have described Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's dancing before the chariot of Jagannātha. In the Fourteenth Chapter, there is an account of the Herā-pañcamī function.
